Classes/ConfirmRule.html.abstract: ConfirmRule is a subclass of Rule that defines how a value that has to be equal

Classes/EmailRule.html.name: EmailRule
Classes/EmailRule.html.abstract: EmailRule is a subclass of RegexRule that defines how a email is validated.

Classes/EnumRule.html.name: EnumRule
Classes/EnumRule.html.abstract: EnumRule is a subclass of ValidationRule that defines how a value is validated against mutiple possible values.

Classes/FloatRule.html.abstract: FloatRule is a subclass of Rule that defines how check if a value is a floating point value.

Classes/FullNameRule.html.abstract: FullNameRule is a subclass of Rule that defines how a full name is validated.
